name: RetrieveCommercePaymentDetails
description:
Retrieve details of a specific commerce payment using its ID.

Use this tool to obtain detailed information about a commerce payment by specifying its unique ID. This can include any details specified by the `properties` query parameter, if required.

parameters.name: commerce_payment_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the commerce payment to retrieve details for. It corresponds to the internal object ID by default.

parameters.name: return_properties
parameters.description: A list of property names to be included in the response. Irrelevant properties will be ignored.

value_schema.description: A comma separated list of the properties to be returned in the response. If any of the specified properties are not present on the requested object(s), they will be ignored.

parameters.name: properties_with_history
parameters.description: List of properties to retrieve along with their historical values. Specify as comma-separated values.

value_schema.description: A comma separated list of the properties to be returned along with their history of previous values. If any of the specified properties are not present on the requested object(s), they will be ignored.

parameters.name: associated_object_types
parameters.description: List of object types to retrieve associated IDs for. If any specified associations do not exist, they are ignored.

value_schema.description: A comma separated list of object types to retrieve associated IDs for. If any of the specified associations do not exist, they will be ignored.

parameters.name: unique_property_name
parameters.description: The property name used as a unique identifier for the commerce payment object.

value_schema.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object

parameters.name: only_return_archived_results
parameters.description: Specify `true` to return only archived results. Default is `false`.

value_schema.description: Whether to return only results that have been archived.
